update(GraphicsInterface, Room) - Method in interface architecture.characters.Updateable
Updates the object based on its specific needs, to be called every game tick
update(GraphicsInterface) - Method in class proceduralGeneration.Room
updates the list of Monsters, Chests, and Player by calling their respective update methods.

Implemented by classes which require periodic updating.
